name: Still Watching
description: Pauses playback after a set period of inactivity, asking 'Are you still watching?'.
overview: A server-side plugin that monitors user activity and automatically pauses playback if no interaction is detected for a configurable time (default 2 hours). It prevents endless playback when a user falls asleep.

versions.changelog: Reverted to SendMessageCommand with 2-hour default timeout and jQuery config page
